attributes.action: Evoke new formal Parliament Order; Working Class, to become next Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: Short of power, comes peace. With peace, comes moral, right decisions.
attributes.background:
Changes are happening.
I believe, the next Prime Minister should be of Working Class. Equality is then forthright, and also with a wisdomous Leader we can make Great Britain, greater. With a PM not of the Conservative Party, of Independence.
A list of changes, objectives per application, voted on.

rejection.details: As you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
